brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must determine the slash notation, number of host bits, and number of hosts possible for the following subnet masks.

A.255.255.255.224.
B.255.255.255.248.
C.255.255.255.252.
D.255.255.128.0.
E.255.255.255.128.
F.255.255.252.0.
G.255.255.255.192.
H.255.255.192.0.
I.255.255.224.0.
J.255.255.255.240.
K.255.255.254.0.
L.255.255.255.0.
M.255.255.248.0.
N.255.255.240.0.
